GSD.description:
clk: qcom: ipq8074: dont disable gcc_sleep_clk_src

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit d401611a93b332914cf91eb9bc0b63fa1bdc17e9. For more details please see the references link.
